div.a: Why You Should Be a Spartan

div.font: For information regarding Luxemburg-Casco School District's response to COVID-19 developments, please visit the District's COVID-19 page.

a.b: Go to the COVID-19 page now

div.font: Now that the referendum has passed, the hard work of implementation has begun! Head over to the Referendum page to find updates on all of the projects underway.

div.a: Why You Should Be a Spartan

div.font: It is the policy of the Luxemburg-Casco School District that no person shall, on the basis of race, sex, religion, natural origin, ancestry, creed, pregnancy, marital status, parental status, sexual orientation or physical, mental, emotional, or learning disability be excluded from participation in, be denied the benefits of, or be subjected to discrimination or harassment under any program or activity, or employment.
